channel.title: Chaotic-Pkz ||24/7|| Webclient|| Gx-PK remake
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Media is coming soon, don't flame.. I'll work on this when I have time as I am busy coding and such..[/size]
[center][color=red]Project insanity: Formation X (Cleaned alot remake of GX-PK But better)[/center]
Information: Chaotic-PKZ is a spawn server, which is another remake from the old spawn server gx-pk (Generation x) I've worked hard on this server, It's close to insta switching and a good spawn server that actually read's defence.
Updates this week [code] -Cleaned unwanted commands -Insta switching -Cleaned out that useless boring customs -Added edge as home -Cleaned teleports [/code]
We are needing the following..
GFX Master: [code] How old are you? Some of your basic/advance work: MSN? [/code]
Web developer [code] Name? How old are you? Some of your forum work Can you code with HTML PHP And CCS? Are you experienced in vBulletin and SMF? Contact information: [/code] Client developer (Needed) [code] How old are you AGE? Are you any good at editing clients very good? some work? [/code] Server developer's [code] NAME? AGE? Some of your work What can you code? Will you be active coding on dropbox? Contact information Will you be an active developer? [/code] Beta testers: [code] Name: Will you report bugs/dupes? [/code]
Will work on this thread later.. If you are accepted then you will be PM'D.

item.dc:creator: @Blademaster55 Blademaster55
item.description:
@Blademaster55 wrote:

Name? Colton
How old are you? 17
Some of your forum work: only one I can find for now dexegg.smfforfree.com (I have had numerous projects that have had their own hosting and domains. Vexegg.com was my one project, currently in the process of story boarding Three Websites as my next project, but looking for a side project seeing as I am not done with the storyboard yet.
Can you code with HTML PHP And CCS? Yes, not really CCS. HTML Some PHP and some Java I have enough knowledge to use to get the codes right and fix codes, I am not at the point where I can create pages and pages of code to accomplish a task yet, however my knowledge is good where it should be able to allow the task given to be accomplished in one way or another.
Are you experienced in vBulletin and SMF? I am experienced with both.
Contact information: blademaster55@live.com

Read full topic
